contextual_notes: User's initial satisfaction was low, likely due to a lack of specific guidance.
The conversation involved repetitive confirmations which may have impacted user satisfaction.
general_insights: Clarifying user intent early can significantly improve satisfaction.
Providing varied and engaging responses can help maintain user engagement.
Acknowledging user progress and confirming understanding can enhance user experience.
